node.title: 'Well spotted': HBO admits to Emma Watson photo mix-up in Harry Potter reunion special
node.alt: A composite of American actress Emma Roberts and British actress Emma Watson.
node.description: HBO producers of the Harry Potter 20-year reunion special have confirmed they made a mistake, showing a childhood photo of US actress Emma Roberts rather than British actress Emma Watson.
node.content:
["HBO producers of the Harry Potter 20th Anniversary \u2014\u00a0Return to Hogwarts have confirmed they made a mistake in the show.", "That's because, during the\u00a0reunion special, a\u00a0childhood photo of who they said was English actress Emma Watson,\u00a0was not Watson at all.", "Rather, the photo was of US actress Emma Roberts.", "Watson played\u00a0Hermione Granger throughout the entire Harry Potter film series.\u00a0\u00a0", "One observant fan was quick to spot the mistake and posted about it on Twitter.", "The post also shows where the original photo came from, which was Roberts' personal Instagram account.\u00a0", "That post from 2012 can still be seen on her page.", "Producers have admitted they used the wrong photo in a statement to US media outlet Entertainment Weekly.\u00a0", "In the statement, the producers said they were working to put up a new version that uses an image of Watson.\u00a0", "\"You brought an editing mistake of a mislabelled photograph to our attention. New version up shortly.\"", "", "
Watson reunited with other cast members from the blockbuster film franchise for the 20th anniversary.(IMDB)
", "Roberts and Watson have not yet commented on the mix-up.", "The Harry Potter reunion special features other members of the main cast, such as\u00a0Daniel Radcliffe,\u00a0who played Harry Potter,\u00a0and Rupert Grint (Ron Weasley).", "It was filmed on the original set in London where the first film was made.", "There are also interviews with Robbie Coltrane (Hagrid), Tom Felton (Draco Malfoy), Helena Bonham Carter (Bellatrix Lestrange), Gary Oldman (Sirius Black) and\u00a0director Chris Columbus.", "You can stream the reunion now on Binge."]
